'''Amreo''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An old man stretches his arms over his head and yawns, making a show of displaying his moistened physique.}}
Grandpa Amreo makes little secret of the fact that he cruises the establishment looking for... Opportunities.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =

|none            = 
|other           = * During the conversation, Amreo's "knees begin to drift apart." The Watcher has reactions to this, and can put him in his place.
** A [dwarven](/dwarf/) or [orlan](/orlan/) Watcher can say ''"No! My eyes!"''
** [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 4: "Go admit to the steward you're treating this establishment like a brothel."
* Further interaction (clicking the NPC) yields flavour text: ''The old man winces, his eyes downcast''.
}}
